foreignData.name: Versierte Alchemistin
foreignData.text:
{T}: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe.
{T}: Erzeuge X Mana genau einer beliebigen Farbe, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Lebenspunkten ist, die du in diesem Zug dazuerhalten hast.

foreignData.name: Alquimista diestra
foreignData.text:
{T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color.
{T}: Agrega X manás de un color cualquiera, donde X es la cantidad de vidas que ganaste este turno.

foreignData.name: Alchimiste accomplie
foreignData.text:
{T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix.
{T} : Ajoutez X manas de la couleur de votre choix, X étant le nombre de points de vie que vous avez gagné ce tour-ci.

foreignData.name: Alchimista Abile
foreignData.text:
{T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore.
{T}: Aggiungi X mana di un qualsiasi colore, dove X è pari ai punti vita che hai guadagnato in questo turno.

foreignData.name: 成し遂げた錬金術師
foreignData.text:
{T}：好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。
{T}：好きな色１色のマナＸ点を加える。Ｘはこのターンにあなたが得たライフの点数に等しい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — エルフ・ドルイド

name: Accomplished Alchemist
originalText:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.

rulings.text: Accomplished Alchemist’s second ability counts the total amount of life gained without taking into account any life you lost during that turn. For example, if you lost 3 life and gained 3 life earlier in the turn, you’ll add three mana.

text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
